name: Duck!
description:
Control the gate to save the ducks and knock out the crocodiles!

Controls:

- to switch open/close barrier gate.

- to play if you are in the menu or result.

- Left mouse button do both of the things above.

Let the duck pass, yeah

Uh-huh, don't let the croco pass, knock em out!

The duck is waiting, whenever you ready!
